Pope Clement XIII named him treasurer of the Roman Church in 1766. ==Cardinal== In 1775, Pope Clement XIV made Braschi a cardinal. ==Pope== Cardinal Braschi was elected pope in 1775;"Pope Pius VI," Catholic Encyclopedia; retrieved 2011-10-27. and he chose to be called Pius VI.
